sourcesContent:
<template>
    <router-view v-slot="{ Component }">
      <transition :name="transitionName">
      <component :is="Component" />
      </transition>
    </router-view>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    name: 'TransitionRouterView',
    data() {
      return {
        transitionName: ''
      };
    },
    beforeRouteEnter(to, from, next) {
      const fromName = from.name;
      const toName = to.name;
      let transitionName = '';
  
      if (toName === 'page1' && fromName === 'page2') {
        transitionName = 'slide-down';
      } else if (toName === 'page2' && fromName === 'page1') {
        transitionName = 'slide-up';
      } else if (
        ['page3', 'page4', 'page5'].includes(toName) &&
        ['page1', 'page2'].includes(fromName)
      ) {
        transitionName = 'slide-left';
      } else if (
        ['page1', 'page2'].includes(toName) &&
        ['page3', 'page4', 'page5'].includes(fromName)
      ) {
        transitionName = 'slide-right';
      }
  
      next(vm => {
        vm.transitionName = transitionName;
      });
    }
  };
  </script>
  

  <style scoped>
/* 定义滚动切换过渡效果 */
.slide-up-enter-active,
.slide-up-leave-active,
.slide-left-enter-active,
.slide-left-leave-active,
.slide-right-enter-active,
.slide-right-leave-active {
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.slide-up-enter,
.slide-up-leave-to {
  transform: translateY(-100%);
}

.slide-left-enter,
.slide-left-leave-to {
  transform: translateX(-100%);
}

.slide-right-enter,
.slide-right-leave-to {
  transform: translateX(100%);
}
</style>
